content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_bed
inventory=[{"type": "anvil", "quantity": 56, "index": 13}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 19, "index": 18}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 57, "index": 23}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 62, "index": 24}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 13, "index": 33}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 37}, {"type": "jungle_sign", "quantity": 4, "index": 39}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "purple_concrete", "quantity": 8, "index": 43}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 38, "index": 44}]

thought: I need to craft a light_gray_bed, and the first step is to craft a light_gray_dye. To craft a light_gray_dye, I need to place 1 black_dye and 2 white_dye in the crafting table. I will start by moving the black_dye from slot 32 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_bed
inventory=[{"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "anvil", "quantity": 56, "index": 13}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 19, "index": 18}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 57, "index": 23}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 62, "index": 24}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 13, "index": 33}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 37}, {"type": "jungle_sign", "quantity": 4, "index": 39}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "purple_concrete", "quantity": 8, "index": 43}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 38, "index": 44}]
thought: Next I will move 1 of the white_dye from slot 37 to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Ok
